nodes.text: The Trade Federation laboratory was a secret laboratory that was constructed beneath the planet Naboo's eastern swamps during the Invasion of Naboo. During the Clone Wars, Doctor Nuvo Vindi used it to resurrect the fatal Blue Shadow Virus in order to use it as a biological weapon. After the attempt by Vindi failed, the lab was destroyed, and it eventually was covered up by the swamp, appearing as though it never existed.
